modName: How to Make Reflective Normal Maps
summary: A clear tutorial that teaches you how to make reflective normal maps with total of 5 images.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
This tutorial teaches you how to make reflective normal maps. Tutorial is only for Photoshop users.

If you're here to learn how to make normal maps, this tutorial teaches you how to make the normal maps reflective, not teaches you how to
make a normal map.

[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]I know that stone normally shouldn't be reflective too, okay? :P Just something I accidently found out while trying to make dull normal maps.

[/size][/color][/font][size=3][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8]Feel free to check[/color][/font] [font=Lucida Sans Unicode][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59588/?]Modern Whiterun Floor[/url] [/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8]to see the reflection.[/color][/font][/size][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
